beheadment.title: Beheadment
beheadment.body: A word or phrase becomes another when its first letter is removed.

charade.title: Charade
charade.body: A word or phrase is broken into two or more shorter ones.

curtailment.title: Curtailment
curtailment.body: A word or phrase becomes another when its last letter is removed.

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.body: A word or phrase becomes another when an interior letter is removed.

phonetic.title: Phonetic...
phonetic.body: Puzzle variations in which sounds are the basic unit instead of letters.
